name: Fishjong 2
description:
Fishjong is back with more colorful mahjong levels! Now play Fishjong 2! The goal is simple – clear the board by making matches. Various colors and shapes of tiles, new set and background. No storyline - just a great mahjong gameplay. Have fun playing ocean-theme levels.

Features:

- 108 levels to match free tiles
- More customizable content
- Relaxing gameplay and music
- Earn stars
